Installation¶

This documentation covers the source code used in a demonstration program at the University of Stavanger. This includes a pip installable package, rwsuis, which is covered in Robot Web Services.

Here are the different ways of acquiring the software.

$ pip install¶

To install the rwsuis package, simply run this command in your terminal of choice:
pip install RWS-UiS

Get the source code¶

All code from the docs is on GitHub, and the public repository can be cloned:
git clone https://github.com/prinsWindy/ABB-Robot-Machine-Vision.git

ABB-Robot-Machine-Vision
